name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: The 48MP Main camera is more advanced than ever, capturing super‑high‑resolution photos with a new level of detail and color.

name: MacBook Air 13-inch
description: MacBook Air Laptop M1 Chip, 13” Retina Display, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD Storage, Backlit Keyboard, FaceTime HD Camera, Touch ID. Works with iPhone/iPad.

name: XIAOMI BLUETOOTH HEADSET
description: Xiaomi Wireless Bluetooth Headset, music accompanies you, listening to sounds anytime, anywhere. With lots of features, such as apt-X Lossless Transmission, 40mm Dynamic Driver.

name: Apple Watch Series 7
description: Apple Watch Series 7 features the largest, most advanced display yet, breakthrough health innovations, and is the most durable Apple Watch ever.

name: Bravia 55 Inch 4k Tv
description: Sony Bravia 55 Inch | 4K Ultra HD | High Dynamic Range (HDR) | Smart TV (Google TV), Dolby Vision® and Dolby Atmos®. Enjoy cinematic thrills at home.

name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
description: The Google Pixel 8 Pro excels with its versatile display, leading in readability and color. Experience improved tuning and HDR10 playback.

name: 23.5 inch Curved Monitor
description: Enjoy a truly immersive viewing experience with the Samsung CF390 Curved Screen Computer Monitor. The 1800R curvature of the screen lets you enjoy big.

name: Surface Pro 7
description: Surface Pro 7+ is your 12.3” touchscreen 2-in-1 laptop that endlessly adapts to you, now with faster processing, more connections, and all-day battery life.
